text_block_list.text: On one of my days off I decided to visit this cafe. I saw that Curren Chan had come here earlier when I checked her Umastagram.
I figured there might be a clue here to help me learn more about her.  With that in mind, I scanned the open area…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Mmmm ♪ This is so sweet ♪ Parfaits make me so happy ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Phew… Ah, I ended up finishing it too quickly. How unfortunate.
It seems like Curren Chan came here to relax. It looks like she hasn't noticed me…
choice_data_list: I guess I'll just watch her for now…

text_block_list.text: I feel a little guilty for watching her in secret like this, but this might be my chance to have a glimpse of her private life.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Now then…♪ Guess it's time to do some shopping.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Wah, this one piece outfit is so cute ♪ I love its crimson color!

text_block_list.name: Shop Assistant
text_block_list.text: So you prefer darker colors? They do seem to look good on you.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, thank you very much ♪ I love darker colors because they help to bring out the beauty of my skin.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: That's why when I was younger I'd wear magenta to my recitals. And when I was 4 years old I started to wear violet.

text_block_list.name: Shop Assistant
text_block_list.text: To have a grasp of color contrasts at 4 years old! I would expect nothing less of "Curren"!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Okay, I've decided! I'd like this one piece outfit.
After purchasing that outfit Curren Chan continued her shopping venture…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Wah, it's so cute! Look at the kitty cat plushie ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: It's almost like it's screaming "Curren Chan, take me with you!" Hmm, maybe I should take him home… Oh, what should I do?

text_block_list.name: Young Passerby
text_block_list.text: …!? …!!!! Sh… She's… She's so… Cute…!?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Young Passerby
text_block_list.text: A-Are… Are you… Are you a goddess?  No… An angel? No, that's not it… I think this is the first time I've truly opened my eyes…?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Aha, so you've been enlightened by me, huh? Welcome to the world of Curren♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I actually happen to be active on Umastagram, so if you wouldn't mind, please follow me.  My handle's "@Curren," got it♪

text_block_list.name: Young Passerby
text_block_list.text: Of course… I will…! You're just… You're just so cute, Curren Chan…!!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Glad to have you as a follower ♪
And that's when I realized… There is no separation of her public and private lives. She exudes cuteness in all aspects of her life, living her life in a pure and happy way.
choice_data_list: What the hell am I doing…
What the hell am I doing…

text_block_list.text: I began to feel embarrassed for following her in secret like this, so I decided to apologize for doing so when…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So? When were you planning on talking to me, Onee-chan?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So? When were you planning on talking to me, Onee-chan?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Jeez, I was waiting for you to talk to me for so long. You're so mean, making a girl wait that long, Onee-chan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Jeez, I was waiting for you to talk to me for so long. You're so mean, making a girl wait that long, Onee-chan!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Why don't we go somewhere more private first…?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan… You don't trust me, do you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan… You don't trust me, do you?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: You followed me because… you didn't know enough about me, right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I appreciate the fact that you want to learn more about me. But, I always show everyone exactly what I want them to see.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: If you only look at that part you will understand my "cuteness." The mysterious, unknown parts only add to that charm.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: That's why I want you to just love this cute Curren, Onee-chan. That's all I want…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: That's why I want you to just love this cute Curren, Onee-chan. That's all I want…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: So, could you do that for me…?
Sure, if I were only trying to be her associate I could go along with that.  And she would likely be happy with that. However…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Eh…?
choice_data_list: As your trainer I have to refuse.
As your trainer I have to refuse.

text_block_list.text: As her trainer, I will make her dreams come true… I can't sit around simply admiring her charms like everyone else is.
choice_data_list: So please tell me more about yourself.
So please tell me more about yourself.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: You hate losing too, huh…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I get it. I'll consider it, okay? I guess I have to since I upset you to the point where you began stalking me, isn't that right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Fine, I'll forgive you ♪ Because you love me, don't you, Onee-chan?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Fine, I'll forgive you ♪ Because you love me, don't you, Onee-chan?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hmph, what's with that reaction? So, you actually hate me…?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Aha, so you love me♪ Well I love…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Nope, can't tell you that yet…♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Maybe if we go on plenty of dates after this… I'd want to actually say it?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Plus you'd get to learn a lot more about me, don't you think? So what're you gonna do, Onee-chan♪
choice_data_list: I'll take you on plenty of dates!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Plus you'd get to learn a lot more about me, don't you think? So what're you gonna do, Onee-chan♪
choice_data_list: I'll take you on plenty of dates!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Aha, yay ♪ We're gonna go on dates ♪ And we'll even link arms!
We then spent the rest of the day together. It seems like I grew a little closer to her…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan, I really want a cafe latte right now… Could you get me one♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan, I really want a cafe latte right now… Could you get me one♪
Or maybe not…
